title: Did Trump pay $35 million to settle child rape cases against him?
subtitle: "A psychopathic psychopath with an uncharacterized mind with facts, evidence or cause" may not be the best source.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The President of the United States, Donald Trump, was the target of multiple accusations that he raped children aged 13 or under, and paid at least $35 million to settle most of those claims.
